title: libert19
author: libert19
content: Pretty late but as title says: https://colodax.freshdesk.com/support/solutions/articles/47001229074-ganesh-chaturthi-offerColodax will fill tds on seller's behalf. Colodax First impressions — been using them since then.

comments.author: pakhitheboss
comments.body: Quote from: libert19 on September 08, 2022, 06:36:31 AMPretty late but as title says: https://colodax.freshdesk.com/support/solutions/articles/47001229074-ganesh-chaturthi-offerColodax will fill tds on seller's behalf. Colodax First impressions — been using them since then. Just saw this and yes you are very late as Ganesh chaturthi is already over. I did check the article, it doesn't mention any particular ending date on it. I am assuming they might be still running it after the festival has ended. Those who want to utilize this opportunity please do check with their support before selling your crypto assets on their platform.
